name: Learn Godot's GDScript From Zero - custom build [Русская Версия]
name_original: Learn Godot's GDScript From Zero - custom build [Русская Версия]
description:
Originally created for personal use, without the aim of conforming as closely as possible to the official translation guide-lines.

Some terms have been translated differently and clarifications added.
The text combines different versions 28.10.22-22.01.23. Based on a partial official Russian translation.
